Stars.Name: Luck
Stars.Description: Search the lands for greater goods.

Stars.Name: Shard Searcher
Stars.Description: Guides you to finding even more useful ore.
Abilities: Increases amount of ore mined by 10%.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Mining
Stars.Description: Show how to have more mastery over your laser.

Stars.Name: Knowledge
Stars.Description: Knowledge is power - with this you will gain even more.
Abilities: Increases experience gain by 5%.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Knowledge and Luck
Stars.Description: With a little luck and brains you can do anything.

Stars.Name: Knowledge and Accuracy
Stars.Description: See the weakness of your enemies and know how to exploit it.

Stars.Name: Knowledge and Critical
Stars.Description: A star too small to be a planet but hurts too much to accept the truth.

Stars.Name: Luck
Stars.Description: So glad to see you all the way out here, the star focuses on finding better gear.

Stars.Name: Luck and DYI
Stars.Description: Speeds up crafting...I know I would love that.

Stars.Name: Alchemy, Heartiness, and Leaping
Stars.Description: Leap for the stars!!!!

Stars.Name: Harvest
Stars.Description: Grow even more crops.
Abilities: Increases harvesting by 10%.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Heartiness and Healing
Stars.Description: Grants the feeling of vigor you get from eating a large meal.

Stars.Name: Harvest 2.0
Stars.Description: Ultimate Harvest upgrade for any gathering min/maxer.
Abilities: Increases harvesting by 15%.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Haste and Critical
Stars.Description: A reward for gathering - hitting hard and fast.

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: When searching for items, you have gained greater defense.

Stars.Name: Attack
Stars.Description: Working on mining has given you a little more edge.

Stars.Name: Shard Searcher 2.0
Stars.Description: Lots more shiny ore to collect.
Abilities: Increases amount of ore mined by 15%.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Mining and Heartiness
Stars.Description: This is the end of the path... was it worth it?

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: An extra flask here and there, soon you'll be invincible...

Stars.Name: Healing and Caffeine
Stars.Description: A little bit of coffee will heal anyone.

Stars.Name: Mining and Leaps
Stars.Description: Mine with ease of being able to jump a little more.

Stars.Name: Long Reach
Stars.Description: When mounted, Harvest at short range.
Abilities: Slightly increases gathering range when mounted.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Alchemy and Healing
Stars.Description: Gain healing and the ability to heal more. Sounds good, right?

Stars.Name: Sundard Flight
Stars.Description: Fly free you fools in the Sundered Uplands.
Abilities: Reduces glide reduction in Uber 7 of Sundered Uplands.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Sundered Flight 2.0
Stars.Description: Fly even faster.
Stats: Reduces glide reduction in Uber 10 and lower of Sundered Uplands.

Stars.Name: Sundered Flight 3.0
Stars.Description: I am like a dragon, I only fly away.
Stats: Reduces glide reduction in all Sundered Uplands.
Grants a Caprian Dragon Egg Fragment when upgrading

Stars.Name: Mining and Heartiness
Stars.Description: This star gains the boon of health and mining.

Stars.Name: Long Reach 2.0
Stars.Description: When mounted, Harvest at medium range.
Abilities: Moderately increases gathering range when mounted.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: After searching the stars, you have gained increased magic.

Stars.Name: Heartiness
Stars.Description: Hee Hee this star gives more health.

Stars.Name: Long Reach 3.0
Stars.Description: When mounted Harvest at Loooooooooooonger range. \nGrants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked
Abilities: Greatly increases gathering range when mounted.

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: Exploring and armoring up.

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: Seeing the final frontier has left you tough.

Stars.Name: Heartiness, Haste, and Mining
Stars.Description: Intense searching has led you to greater speed and adaptability.
Abilities: Increases Maximum Health by 10%.
Increases Attack Speed by 20.
Increases Lasermancy by 15.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: Extra flasks are always good.

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: Magic power from gathering so much knowledge.

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: You did so much Mining it improved your Physical Damage. Noice.

Stars.Name: Knowledge
Stars.Description: Increased experience gain is always good.

Stars.Name: Luck
Stars.Description: Little bit of luck on this side of the stars as well.

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: Gathering stars together has increased your strength.

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: A branch of a constellation related to Flasks? What could go wrong?

Stars.Name: Minor Buffing
Stars.Description: Random buffs are always great because they are buffs.
Abilities: 50% chance when using a Flask to gain either an Attack Buff, Defense Buff, or Healing Buff.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Accuracy and Critical
Stars.Description: Real Critting is more about following your heart than following a build.

Stars.Name: Leaping and Anti-Knockback
Stars.Description: This should help you jump and not get thrown across the room in delves.

Stars.Name: Greater Alchemic Power
Stars.Description: Why are flasks so OP... here is a random one.
Abilities: 10% chance to gain a random emblem effect when using a flask.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Greater Alchemic Power 2.0
Stars.Description: More random effects. MOOOOORREEEEE!!!!
Stats: Increases the chance to gain a random emblem effect when using a flask by 3%.

Stars.Name: Greater Alchemic Power 3.0
Stars.Description: A higher chance to get additional effects is always good.
Stats: Increases the chance to gain a random emblem effect when using a flask by 3%.
Grants a Caprian Dragon Egg Fragment when upgrading

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: This shooting star is so fast it teaches trovians to hit faster.

Stars.Name: Speed
Stars.Description: Little bit of speed to help you in the world.

Stars.Name: Flask Renewal
Stars.Description: Fighting throughout this Trovian world has given you the intellect to randomly recharge flasks.
Abilities: 5% chance to gain a flask charge when using a Flask.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Speed
Stars.Description: When visiting the final frontier, it's always good to have speed.

Stars.Name: Heartiness
Stars.Description: Star of health bless us with more health please.

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Attack speed is all some classes need.

Stars.Name: Flask Renewal 2.0
Stars.Description: A Blessing of bountiful flasks... I really hope this is not too OP... Maybe I need to nerf Death-Defying...
Abilities: 10% chance to gain a flask charge when using a Flask.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: Now that flasks are powered up, heres a few more.

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: So Many Flasks!!!!!

Stars.Name: Minor Buffing Always
Stars.Description: You get a buff, and you get a buff, everybody gets a buff.
Abilities: 100% chance when using a Flask to gain either an Attack Buff, Defense Buff, or Healing Buff.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Strength and Intellect
Stars.Description: Drinking too many flasks has made the random buffs gained from them stick.

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: The shield may be just as important as DPS number charts.

Stars.Name: Healing
Stars.Description: Moooooooooooreeeeeeeee Healing PLEASE!!!

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Star of speed give me swiftness to strike my foes.

Stars.Name: Draining Kiss
Stars.Description: Drain health from your enemies.
Abilities: Damaging enemies grants 10% Life Leech.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Attacks so fast you can not even animate fast enough.

Stars.Name: Healing and Heartiness
Stars.Description: In this constellation of dungeon seeking we greet thee with more health.

Stars.Name: Draining Kiss
Stars.Description: With faster attack and higher life leech you may someday be invincible.
Abilities: Damaging enemies grants 20% Life Leech.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Strength and Intellect
Stars.Description: Two damage types, maybe someday we will search the stars and find the 3rd one.

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Speed through the stars for greater power.

Stars.Name: Accuracy
Stars.Description: One day it will be super important to have a lot of this. Wink Wink

Stars.Name: Speed
Stars.Description: Fly, you fools, Fly to the end of that Delve.

Stars.Name: Bounty Hunt Boon
Stars.Description: Hunting enemies now grants you boons.
Abilities: After defeating a Sundered Uplands 5 Star Boss, gain 10% increased Physical and Magic Damage for 4 hours.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Bounty Hunt
Stars.Description: Looking up at the stars has granted additional buff time.
Stats: Increases Bounty Hunt Boon to give an additional 5% to Physical and Magic Damage.

Stars.Name: Light
Stars.Description: Grant me the true power of the stars. May I destroy the darkness of the cosmos.

Stars.Name: Accuracy
Stars.Description: Wink Wink...

Stars.Name: Leaping and Anti-Knockback
Stars.Description: Jump up without being pushed around by bullies.

Stars.Name: Critical
Stars.Description: Looking to the stars to decide how to increase those damage numbers.

Stars.Name: Light
Stars.Description: Greater shining light to destroy the dark.
Abilities: Increases Light by 150.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Alchemy
Stars.Description: Oops, did I leave a flask over on this side of the cosmos.

Stars.Name: Depths Boon
Stars.Description: Delving just got a little bit easier.
Abilities: After defeating a delve boss, gain 20% damage reduction for 30 minutes.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Depths Boon 2.0
Stars.Description: A little more time to the boon you just got.
Stats: Increases the Depths boon damage reduction to 25% and duration to 1 hour.

Stars.Name: Light
Stars.Description: Look up at the sky one night and see the lights above.

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: Within the Strength side of the constellation we try to make Physical based classes tougher than the squishy magic ones.

Stars.Name: Lucky Strikes
Stars.Description: Slot machine of extra damage. I like it.
Abilities: 5% chance when critical hitting to increase Critical Hit Chance by 20% for 10 seconds.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Hitting more often means more Critical Hits.

Stars.Name: Accuracy
Stars.Description: A star viewing will lead you to never missing your target's weakness.

Stars.Name: Leaping and Anti-Knockback
Stars.Description: If you get knocked back, you cannot critically hit as much.

Stars.Name: Accuracy
Stars.Description: Look to the stars for a class that can use lots of critical hit...It's not up there.

Stars.Name: Lucky Strikes 2.0
Stars.Description: More Strikes then equals less pins to hit.
Abilities: 10% chance when critical hitting to increase Critical Hit Chance by 30% for 10 seconds.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Accuracy, Intellect, and Strength
Stars.Description: Wow... Magic and Physical Damage with a little Critical Hit... Maybe this should be a Major Star.

Stars.Name: Accuracy and Heartiness
Stars.Description: Finding this star could grant more then just Health and Critical Hit.
Stats: Grants a Caprian Dragon Egg Fragment when upgrading

Stars.Name: Accuracy
Stars.Description: Accurately read the stars.

Stars.Name: Reflection
Stars.Description: They hit you and you hit them back.
Abilities: When taking damage, you have a 10% chance to gain a 20% reflect shield for 10 seconds.
Has a 1 minute cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: Continue to grow your strength and prove Might is better then brains.

Stars.Name: Reflection 2.0
Stars.Description: Reflect even more damage back at your foes.
Abilities: When taking damage, you have a 20% chance to gain a 30% reflect shield for 10 seconds.
Has a 1 minute cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: Attack and defend is what these stars are about.

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: YESSSS... MORE STRENGTH!!!!

Stars.Name: Protection
Stars.Description: Additional shields will be needed for future bosses.

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: Will need to double check numbers to make sure this is not too much strength.

Stars.Name: Reflection 3.0
Stars.Description: This star should help balance melee a little more.
Abilities: When taking damage, you have a 30% chance to gain a 45% reflect shield and 30% damage reduction for 10 seconds.
Has a 1 minute cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Strength
Stars.Description: Ultimate Strength star is better than a Magic Star.

Stars.Name: Anti-Knockback
Stars.Description: Not going to push around the brawler.

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: Gain greater arcane knowledge to blast your foe down this path.

Stars.Name: Rage
Stars.Description: Star of ARRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!
Abilities: When dropping below 30% health, gain a 6% Outgoing damage buff and 10% Attack Speed for 10 seconds.
120 second cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: This star come with a free library card. Somehow that's what increases your damage.

Stars.Name: Heartiness
Stars.Description: Look at this star trying to make you less squishy over here.

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: Wow, mind exploded.

Stars.Name: Heartiness
Stars.Description: This star's blessing hopes you live a long and healthy life.

Stars.Name: Rage 1.5
Stars.Description: Give in to your anger.
Abilities: When dropping below 40% health, gain a 8% Outgoing damage buff and 10% Attack Speed for 10 seconds.
120 second cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Anti-Knockback
Stars.Description: Even though most magic classes have good range, here is some stability so you don't go flying.

Stars.Name: Speed
Stars.Description: Little bit of speed for slow magic classes.

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: Unlimited Magic... unless you run out of energy regen.

Stars.Name: Haste
Stars.Description: Oops, didn't I mean to make this a health star?

Stars.Name: Rage 2.5
Stars.Description: Kind of odd that the intellect tree has a rage mechanic...I guess it's a nerd rage.
Abilities: When dropping below 45% health, gain a 10% Outgoing damage buff and 10% Attack Speed for 10 seconds.
120 second cooldown.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Heartiness
Stars.Description: Ahhh this is where I put that Health Star.

Stars.Name: Intellect
Stars.Description: The final star spell is ready. Are you ready to cast it?

Stars.Name: Rage 3.0
Stars.Description: This Star represents our home which was destroyed by the Void.
Abilities: When dropping below 45% health, gain a 12% Outgoing damage buff and 10% Attack Speed for 15 seconds
120 second cooldown.
Grants Ursa Major when upgrading
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Weakness
Stars.Description: You have found the Weakness, now keep on attacking.
Abilities: 5% chance when critical hitting to increase Critical Hit Damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
Grants a Balefire Dragon Egg Fragment when unlocked

Stars.Name: Critical
Stars.Description: Stop being so critical.

Stars.Name: Weakness 1.5
Stars.Description: A star all about seeing overly sized numbers appearing.
Stats: 10% chance when critical hitting to increases Critical Hit Damage by 25% for 10 seconds." #45

Stars.Name: Critical
Stars.Description: A Critical Hit!

Stars.Name: Critical
Stars.Description: The Star Chart was critically well received by the players.\nThey had nothing negative to say about it.
